title: "Opinion: Recreation’s therapeutic value is huge. That’s why I teach patients to have fun."
excerpt: "They looked forward to recreation therapy groups — they were an incentive. Ineligibility to attend groups was the ramification of an inmate’s misconduct; the consequence had them think twice before violating the prison’s rules. This reward system positively impacted the inmate’s well-being and the overall institution."
